Classes
Class
Description
Lab4FinalTests
 
Test
 
TestBlockchainConcurrent
Tests blockchain forking scenarios by simulating forks and observing if nodes correctly resolve them.
TestBlockConsensus
Tests the consensus mechanism of the blockchain network to ensure that all nodes agree on the same blockchain state after multiple transactions have been broadcast and blocks mined.
TestFirstBlockMining
Tests the mining of the first block following the genesis block across multiple nodes in a blockchain network.
TestInitialSetup
Tests the initial setup of the blockchain network to ensure that all nodes correctly mine the genesis block.
TestInvalidTransaction
This class tests the blockchain network's ability to correctly identify and reject invalid transactions.
TestNodeFailureResilience
This class tests the resilience of the blockchain network to node failures.
TestOutdatedInformationRejection
Test class to simulate outdated information rejection in a blockchain scenario.
